name: Magnify & Microfy
description:
Magnify & Microfy

In Magnify & Microfy, you play as a detective, searching for clues in an empty mansion. But, how do you do this ? You're not a detective in real life, are you ? Well.. every good detective has got a good old magnifying glass, it would be uncanny if you're one without it. What do magnifying glasses do ? they MAGNIFY things. Use this to change the scale of objects around you and find the clue in 10 little puzzle themed levels.

Magnify & Microfy is a 1st person, singleplayer, simple puzzle game where the mechanic is to use the objects around you, to get to your objective. Magnify & Microfy features 10 levels, starting from easy, and evolving in more challenging levels.

If you feel interested, but not quite sold, you can always watch the trailer in the top right! Might that convince you to give it a go.

Magnify & Microfy is a project by Tom Dorpmans. It was set as an assignment to be his finishing project in his second year (highschool).
